Oddities and Curious Lands

the art of Jason Nelson

In case you are ever bored, there are some things you should be doing on the internet. Several of those things were made by Jason Nelson.

You might start with the games (“i made this, you play this, we are enemies” shown above), then perhaps some “Stunningly Harmful Songs… for spreading and baffling and loving.” You can explore on your own from there.
